description.value:
You deliver poisons in ways that maximize their harmful effects. When you apply a simple poison with @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Poison Weapon]{Poison Weapon}, the poison deals [[/r {2d4}[poison]]]{2d4 poison damage} instead of [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4 poison damage}. You don't waste a poison you apply with Poison Weapon on a critically failed attack roll.

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.Effect: Improved Poison Weapon]{Effect: Improved Poison Weapon}
